DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the effect of PandelÂ® (hydrocortisone probutate cream) Cream 0.1% on the Hypothalamic Pituitary Adrenal (HPA) axis in pediatric and adult subjects with either psoriasis or atopic dermatitis involving greater than 20% body surface area.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Evaluate Effect of Pandel Cream 0.1% on HPA Axis in Pediatric and Adult Population
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of psoriasis or atopic dermatitis involving more than 20% of body surface area Good health with the exception of psoriasis or atopic dermatitis Any disease affecting the HPAaxis Subjects who are pregnant, nursing, or planning a pregnancy within the study participation period
